text:
There is a typo in the french version of the Apache 1.3 documentation.
If you follow this link and if your browser displays the french version of this
file, then you will read :
«Directive <FilesMatch>
Syntaxe : <FilesMatch regex> ... </Files>
»

</Files> should be replaced by </FilesMatch>
creator: stan@renan.org
slive@apache.org
text: Thanks.  This will be fixed in the next release.
